resources.string: Midlands Riders: The UK’s Number 1 Diverse Ride Out Group.

Midlands Riders host fortnightly ride outs for anyone that wishes to join in, dont want to ride alone? Want to ride with other like minded bikers ? Your in the right place ! We also run weekly short rides to cafes and biker nights and this APP should help you join in with thousands of bikers just click the event tab to view !

We are a Diverse group which is from 50cc to any size bike, we cater for L plate riders as well as the big bikes. ANY Age or Gender, Some Riders Even bring there kids along as a pilly’ - This is a family community group.

Each Ride out will have MR Marshalls that will get you to the place we are riding too safely and all together. Most of our Marshalls come with first aid or biker down training. Our Ride outs can vary from beach rides to sight seeing places in and around the UK: all done in the 1 ride day.

Midlands Riders isnt an area, its a name. We have riders from as far north as Scotland, Far East As Lincoln, South As Devon and West As The Coast. We Even Have European and WORLD members. You dont have to attend all our rides to be a member, you can grab a hoody and Rep’ in your area at your towns rides and events. MR Shop: www.midlandsriders.com/shop
Want to see where members are and have been? Go to MR places : www.midlandsriders.com/mr-places
Facebook group with thousands of bikers in that chat everyday : www.facebook.com/groups/midlandsridersofficial
Come Join in Today With Thousands of other bikers.
